    Thong style upper which extends to a backfoot strap with a buckled Velcro closure
    Smooth footbed with branding in the forefoot and heel region
    Rubber outsole with branded lugs

Warranty: 3 months from the date of purchase against manufacturing defects only

  • The Puma Sonic is a sports sandal designed to bear all the wear and tear you subject it to. Perfect for the monsoon and the summer
column24:
this pair is an all-season staple. Wear it with ankle socks for the winter - comfort and warmth! What's more its easier to get out of and get in to!

  • Product Details

  • Open toed Sports sandal
column25:
has a forefoot strap and a midfoot strap (with a back strap) with a Velcro closure
Rubber footbed with grooves in it
TPU outsole with circular nubs all over

  • Synthetic

rubber
